Html:
The last release of the WPF Toolkit was in Feb of 2010 and the chart controls don't work in .NET 4.0. Many of the other controls have in the toolkit showed up in .NET 4 (such as Celander), but I don't see the chart controls anywhere.

So, have they been abandoned? Should I avoid using these chart controls all together, or is there some plan to release them in some future .NET 4.0 service pack?
